title: Yeast Lords: The Bronco Years
description: Based on the writing of Benjamin Purvis, a story about two lonely souls that find love during a time of war and disease.
quote: Working at the yeast facility has made my breasts so big and gave me so many diseases.
altHero: two men riding reindeer, they are obviously little models
alt1: Crissop and Donaho with arms up diagonally, entering a lair
alt2: Crissop and Donaho walking with mountains behind
alt3: man wearing golden headdress pointing a gun from behind a rock; the shot is overexposed
